00020 package org.ofsm;
00021 
00022 import org.ofsm.impl.FiniteStateMachineBuilder;
00023 
00034 public class FiniteStateMachineFactory {
00035     protected FiniteStateMachineFactory() {};
00036     private final String version = "1.0.0b";
00037     
00038     static private FiniteStateMachineFactory instance = new FiniteStateMachineFactory();
00039     
00044     public static FiniteStateMachineFactory getInstance() {
00045         return instance;
00046     }
00047     
00056     public IFiniteStateMachineBuilder newBuilder() throws Exception {
00057         String builderClassStr = System.getProperty("org.ofsm.machinebuilder");
00058         if(builderClassStr == null) {
00059             return new FiniteStateMachineBuilder();
00060         }
00061         else {
00062             Class<IFiniteStateMachineBuilder> builderClass = (Class<IFiniteStateMachineBuilder>)Class.forName(builderClassStr);
00063             return builderClass.newInstance();
00064         }
00065     }
00066 
00071     public String getVersion() {
00072         return version;
00073     }
00074 }
